DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate activity of gefitinib in subjects with relapsed prostate cancer by estimating PSA response rate at study closure
DOC.brief_title: Gefitinib in the Treatment of the First Relapse of Prostate Cancer Beyond Prostatectomy or Radiotherapy
DOC.criteria: Relapsed prostate cancer after prostatectomy or radiotherapy PSA levels below 10 ng/mL Lymph node negative Metastasis negative Withdrawal of hormone therapy at least 6 months before entry into the study Written informed consent Metastatic disease Hormonal treatment 6 months before study entry Concomitant radiotherapy, surgery and/or chemotherapy ILD
